name: Tromp the Domains
oracle_text: Domain — Until end of turn, creatures you control gain trample and get +1/+1 for each basic land type among lands you control.
flavor_text: Ground into the footprints of the ravaging herd were clumps of salt from Benalia, moss from Llanowar, dust from Hurloon, and ash from as far as Urborg.

name: Spinneret Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have reach. (They can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: Each new generation of slivers evolves to assimilate the strengths of the prey upon which their progenitors fed.

name: Reflex Sliver
oracle_text: All Sliver creatures have haste.
flavor_text:
"This sliver comes into the world a perfect predator. It's ready to hunt and devour its first meal within seconds of hatching."
—Rukarumel, field journal

name: Reclamation Sage
oracle_text: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

name: Primeval Titan
oracle_text:
Trample
Whenever Primeval Titan enters the battlefield or attacks, you may search your library for up to two land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: When nature calls, *run*.

name: Nantuko Shaman
oracle_text:
When Nantuko Shaman enters the battlefield, if you control no tapped lands, draw a card.
Suspend 1—{2}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {2}{G}{G} and exile it with a time counter on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Life and Limb
oracle_text: All Forests and all Saprolings are 1/1 green Saproling creatures and Forest lands in addition to their other types.
flavor_text:
"It was a sight of pain and awe—a twisted forest, migrating across the salt plain in search of richer soil."
—Edahlis, greenseeker

name: Heartwood Storyteller
oracle_text: Whenever a player casts a noncreature spell, each of that player's opponents may draw a card.
flavor_text: His roots reach deep, nurtured not by soil and rain, but by millennia of experience.

name: Scryb Ranger
oracle_text:
Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.)
Flying, protection from blue
Return a Forest you control to its owner's hand: Untap target creature. Activate this ability only once each turn.

name: Greenseeker
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Discard a card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "A rumor passes among the snakes, whispered by the rushes, inspiring the seekers: the goddess Freyalise is alive in Skyshroud."

name: Glittering Wish
oracle_text: You may reveal a multicolored card you own from outside the game and put it into your hand. Exile Glittering Wish.
flavor_text: She wished for gold, but not for the strength to carry it.

name: Ancient Stirrings
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order. (Cards with no colored mana in their mana costs are colorless. Lands are also colorless.)

name: Yavimaya Dryad
oracle_text:
Forestwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Forest.)
When Yavimaya Dryad enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Forest card and put it onto the battlefield tapped under target player's control. If you do, shuffle your library.

name: Seal of Primordium
oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Primordium: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"I am the simplifier, the root that drags all artifice to earth."
—Seal inscription

name: Eternal Witness
oracle_text: When Eternal Witness enters the battlefield, you may return target card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: She remembers every word spoken, from the hero's oath to the baby's cry.

name: Citanul Woodreaders
oracle_text:
Kicker {2}{G} (You may pay an additional {2}{G} as you cast this spell.)
When Citanul Woodreaders enters the battlefield, if it was kicked, draw two cards.
flavor_text: They seek out living trees to glean age-old secrets from sap and wood.

name: Thragtusk
oracle_text:
When Thragtusk enters the battlefield, you gain 5 life.
When Thragtusk leaves the battlefield, create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text:
"Always carry two spears."
—Mokgar, Kalonian hunter

name: Sudden Shock
oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Sudden Shock deals 2 damage to any target.
flavor_text: Arc mages aren't known for their patience.

name: Orcish Cannonade
oracle_text:
Orcish Cannonade deals 2 damage to any target and 3 damage to you.
Draw a card.
flavor_text:
"No ready! No aim! Just fire!"
—Scarback Plagg, orcish captain

name: Thelonite Hermit
oracle_text:
All Saprolings get +1/+1.
Morph {3}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)
When Thelonite Hermit is turned face up, create four 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.

name: Phantom Wurm
oracle_text:
Phantom Wurm enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.
If damage would be dealt to Phantom Wurm, prevent that damage. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Phantom Wurm.
flavor_text: It died with the forest, yet both linger on in twisted form.

name: Kavu Primarch
oracle_text:
Kicker {4} (You may pay an additional {4} as you cast this spell.)
Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)
If Kavu Primarch was kicked, it enters the battlefield with four +1/+1 counters on it.

name: Imperiosaur
oracle_text: Spend only mana produced by basic lands to cast this spell.
flavor_text:
"An ancient, powerful force has overtaken the valley. I sympathize for its former inhabitants, but I rejoice for the land itself."
—Olanti, Muraganda druid

name: Nature's Claim
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"The timeless, tireless jaws of nature shall one day devour us all."
—Sildark, artificer of Omu

name: Krosan Grip
oracle_text:
Split second (As long as this spell is on the stack, players can't cast spells or activate abilities that aren't mana abilities.)
Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Give up these unnatural weapons, these scrolls. Heart and mind and fist are enough."
—Zyd, Kamahlite druid

name: Courser of Kruphix
oracle_text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may play lands from the top of your library.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

name: Beast Within
oracle_text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.
flavor_text:
"Kill the weak so they can't drag the strong down to their level. This is true compassion."
—Benzir, archdruid of Temple Might

name: Thelon of Havenwood
oracle_text:
Each Fungus creature gets +1/+1 for each spore counter on it.
{B}{G}, Exile a Fungus card from a graveyard: Put a spore counter on each Fungus on the battlefield.
flavor_text: "The sight of my thallids still thriving is a bittersweet welcome to this cold waste."

name: Thallid Germinator
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Germinator.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid Germinator: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

name: Sporoloth Ancient
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Sporoloth Ancient.
Creatures you control have "Remove two spore counters from this creature: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token."

name: Sporesower Thallid
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on each Fungus you control.
Remove three spore counters from Sporesower Thallid: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Utopia Mycon
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Utopia Mycon.
Remove three spore counters from Utopia Mycon: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
Sacrifice a Saproling: Add one mana of any color.

name: Thallid Shell-Dweller
oracle_text:
Defender
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a spore counter on Thallid Shell-Dweller.
Remove three spore counters from Thallid Shell-Dweller: Create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.

name: Summoner's Pact
oracle_text:
Search your library for a green creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
At the beginning of your next upkeep, pay {2}{G}{G}. If you don't, you lose the game.

name: Evolutionary Leap
oracle_text: {G}, Sacrifice a creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
flavor_text: The essence of nature is change.

name: Mire Boa
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
{G}: Regenerate Mire Boa.

name: Evolution Charm
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
• Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
• Target creature gains flying until end of turn.

name: Might of Old Krosa
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. If you cast this spell during your main phase, that creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn instead.
flavor_text: Sometimes even humble forest creatures were gifted with mighty emanations from the past.

name: Gaea's Anthem
oracle_text: Creatures you control get +1/+1.
flavor_text:
"To those who can hear it, Gaea's battle song brings power as swift as sunlight and as enduring as the deep roots of the forest."
—Gamelen, Citanul elder

name: Muraganda Petroglyphs
oracle_text: Creatures with no abilities get +2/+2.
flavor_text: Some mages forsake their scrolls and libraries to learn at the feet of ancient trees and sacred stones.

name: Thrill of the Hunt
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +1/+2 until end of turn.
Flashback {W} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Strength in Numbers
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature gains trample and gets +X/+X, where X is the number of attacking creatures.
flavor_text:
"The hermit dies. The outcast dies. The lone wolf dies. Only those who stick together survive this world."
—Uros, Pendelhaven elder

name: Become Immense
oracle_text:
Delve (Each card you exile from your graveyard while casting this spell pays for {1}.)
Target creature gets +6/+6 until end of turn.

name: Uktabi Drake
oracle_text:
Flying, haste
Echo {1}{G}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

name: Penumbra Spider
oracle_text:
Reach
When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.
flavor_text: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.

name: Giant Dustwasp
oracle_text:
Flying
Suspend 4—{1}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {1}{G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Hypergenesis
oracle_text:
Suspend 3—{1}{G}{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {1}{G}{G} and exile it with three time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost.)
Starting with you, each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield. Repeat this process until no one puts a card onto the battlefield.

name: Durkwood Baloth
oracle_text: Suspend 5—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, you may pay {G} and exile it with five time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, cast it without paying its mana cost. It has haste.)

name: Time of Need
oracle_text: Search your library for a legendary creature card, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
flavor_text:
"When the kumo attacked the monks' sacred shrine, a mournful toll for help echoed through the forest. Thus began the Battle of Silk, which would last six years."
—*Great Battles of Kamigawa*

name: Tarmogoyf
oracle_text: Tarmogoyf's power is equal to the number of card types among cards in all graveyards and its toughness is equal to that number plus 1.
flavor_text: What doesn't grow, dies. And what dies grows the tarmogoyf.
